Description: On I-64 at mile marker 280.6 in the City of Norfolk, near Norview Avenue, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The west right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On VA-7 East in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of Potomac View Rd; Rt. 637S (Loudoun County); Rt. 637N/S (Loudoun County); Rt. 637N (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 148.6 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-1 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Backlick Rd; Rt. 617N/S (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south left lane, left center lane, right center lane, and right lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
